description: Enhance Language Modal with historical context and technical metadata, and add an Asset Health Dashboard for missing logos.

userStories.title: Add paradigm and typeSystem to LanguagesMetadata
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to define paradigm and type system fields in the metadata so they can be displayed in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Update LanguagesMetadata.ts types to include 'paradigm' and 'typeSystem' in LanguageMeta interface
Populate paradigm and typeSystem for at least the top 5 languages (C, Rust, Java, Python, JavaScript)

userStories.title: Add History and Metadata sections to Lang Modal HTML
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Language Modal HTML to have containers for history and technical specs.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Historical Context' section to langModal in HTMLGenerator.ts above 'Creators & Authors'
Add a 'Technical Specs' row in the modal header or body for Paradigm and Type System
Add corresponding edit inputs for these new fields in the modal

userStories.title: Populate new modal fields via JavaScript
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the actual history and metadata when I open a language modal.
acceptanceCriteria: Update report_client.js to populate modalHistory, modalParadigm, and modalTypeSystem when openModal is called
Ensure history section is hidden if no history data exists
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Browser verification skipped as I am in CLI mode, but logic is verified via code review and tsc.

userStories.title: Implement Asset Health Dashboard
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a section at the bottom of the report identifying missing logos.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Asset Health' section to HTMLGenerator.ts that appears at the bottom of the report
Logic identifies languages in orderedLanguages that do not have a matching file in logos/
Display the count and names of languages missing logos
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Dashboard added to the bottom of the report. missingLogos logic uses orderedLanguages and logoMap.
